content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All mining drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) for automation
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters for automation

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for automation

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles providing power distribution

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract from empty or non-existent containers
- Verify that the target chest exists and contains the items you want to extract
- Check inventory contents before attempting extraction
- Ensure you are targeting the correct chest position

### Fuel management issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel and not operating
- Implement a fuel distribution system to keep mining drills running
- Consider automating coal delivery to mining equipment

### System throughput issues
- Some chests are reaching capacity (chest at -5.5,-55.5 is full)
- Add more storage capacity or increase consumption rate
- Consider implementing a better item transport system
